description: Aberdeen face Stirling in Viaplay Cup last 16
title: Aberdeen face Stirling in Viaplay Cup last 16
title_page: Aberdeen face Stirling in Viaplay Cup last 16 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Aberdeen will face Stirling Albion in the last 16 of the Viaplay Cup.
The Pittodrie side, who bypassed the group stage due to their European commitments, will be on the road for the encounter against the third-tier club.
The tie is due to be played on the weekend of 19/20 August.
